channel.title: Guide to making a server(pretty clear and easy) Post all feedback or concerns!
channel.description:
[b]STEP 1:REQUIRMENTS AND WHAT YOU NEED[/b] JAVA(JDKU1 http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/54lqvx1.jpg[/img] Select jdku1 which is the 1st download..
STEP 2: Winrar Go to this link http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm and click the 1st 1 and download..double click on desktop and follow the install instructions [IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/6447zx5.jpg[/img]
STEP 3: Getting a source to create your server, go to this link:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html You can download whichever source you need, extract it with winrar to desktop(easier usage than saving in a file)
STEP 4: No-ip, go to this link http://www.no-ip.com/ at top left hand corner you should see sign up now! click that and follow the instructions to sign up, after that you should see on the left with options hosts/redirects click that and follow my picture: [IMG]http://i19.tinypic.com/63uclrn.jpg[/img]
Step 5: go to www.portforward.com 2nd paragraph look for the orange coded word "routers" click it: [IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/642im35.jpg[/img]
Step 6: Compiling and running your server, go to your source folder that you extracted, go to client.java, hit ctrl+F and look for your sources name..change it to the name you want of your server. Go to compile.bat when your done..if you get an error like you don't have jdk go to mod tharoks perfect compilier and go to compile.bat,right click open with notepad, right click select all hit backspace and insert the compilier: heres the link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html after you compile you should get this: [IMG]http://i8.tinypic.com/628gjmr.jpg[/img]
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
Please tell me if i left anything out..and i will not include hamachi setup as of i can't use due to firewall

nothing personal btw. but i’m looking for a topic that explains how to set classparhs.

i bought new computer. alienware but i dont rememb what classpaths to set. :p[/quote] ooh like variables?yea sorry

item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

STEP 1:REQUIRMENTS AND WHAT YOU NEED
JAVA(JDKU1
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Select jdku1 which is the 1st download…

STEP 2: Winrar
Go to this link http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm and click the 1st 1 and download…double click on desktop and follow the install instructions

STEP 3: Getting a source to create your server, go to this link:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122377.0.html
You can download whichever source you need, extract it with winrar to desktop(easier usage than saving in a file)

STEP 4: No-ip, go to this link http://www.no-ip.com/ at top left hand corner you should see sign up now! click that and follow the instructions to sign up, after that you should see on the left with options hosts/redirects click that and follow my picture:

Step 5: go to www.portforward.com 2nd paragraph look for the orange coded word “routers” click it:

Step 6: Compiling and running your server, go to your source folder that you extracted, go to client.java, hit ctrl+F and look for your sources name…change it to the name you want of your server. Go to compile.bat when your done…if you get an error like you don’t have jdk go to mod tharoks perfect compilier and go to compile.bat,right click open with notepad, right click select all hit backspace and insert the compilier: heres the link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
after you compile you should get this:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

Please tell me if i left anything out…and i will not include hamachi setup as of i can’t use due to firewall
